thread.title: Lisa Frank Wants to Make the Rainbow Makeup Collection of Your Dreams
thread.title_full: Lisa Frank Wants to Make the Rainbow Makeup Collection of Your Dreams

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Lisa Frank Wants to Make the Rainbow Makeup Collection of Your Dreams
text:
Lisa Frank wants your makeup to be just as magical as your middle school trapper keeper.
On Thursday, the 90s nostalgia queen launched a Kickstarter in collaboration with vegan and cruelty-free makeup brand Glamour Dolls in hopes of making a limited-edition makeup collection that will win over your rainbow-loving heart. According to the Kickstarter, the companies hope to raise $30,000 and launch at least six products, including a lip balm, matte mouse, liquid liner, "unicorn lippie," highlight powder, and, of course, a vegan leather makeup bag to keep it all in.
